articles.title: We Ranked 5 AI Models by Security. The Leaderboard Is Wrong.
articles.description: Claude Opus generates vulnerable JWT code every single time — 7 out of 7 runs, always leaking...

articles.title: The AI Hydra Problem: Fix One AI Bug, Get Two More
articles.description: When AI models fix security vulnerabilities, they sometimes introduce entirely new ones. I tested this across 3 remediation rounds with Claude Opus 4.6 using two approaches — ESLint-guided feedback vs. prompt engineering alone. The results expose a fundamental limit of 'fix it again' workflows.

articles.title: Microsoft's ESLint Security Plugin Catches 10% of Vulnerabilities. Here's What It Misses.
articles.description: A head-to-head benchmark between @microsoft/eslint-plugin-sdl and the Interlace security ecosystem. Microsoft's SDL standard covers 1 of 14 security categories.

articles.title: SonarJS Has 269 Rules. It Still Misses 65% of Security Vulnerabilities.
articles.description: A head-to-head benchmark between eslint-plugin-sonarjs and the Interlace security ecosystem. 269 rules vs 201 rules — more isn't better when 65% of vulnerabilities slip through.

articles.title: eslint-plugin-security Is Unmaintained. Here's What Nobody Tells You.
articles.description: eslint-plugin-security has 1.5M weekly downloads but only 13 rules and no meaningful updates since 2020. Learn why it misses 90% of vulnerabilities—including SQL injection, JWT attacks, and AI/LLM security—and what modern ESLint security plugins to use instead.

articles.title: I Let Claude Write 80 Functions. 65-75% Had Security Vulnerabilities.
articles.description: AI coding assistants are incredible—until they introduce security holes. I ran an experiment asking Claude (Haiku 3.5, Sonnet 4.5, Opus 4.5, Opus 4.6) to generate 80 common Node.js functions with zero security context using my Claude Pro subscription. 65-75% had vulnerabilities. Then I tested if static analysis could help the models fix their own mistakes.

articles.title: Exploit Analysis: PostgreSQL COPY FROM Filesystem Access
articles.description: A deep dive into PostgreSQL filesystem exploits. Learn how to engineer static analysis guards to prevent unauthorized database-level file access.

articles.title: The Performance Protocol: Solving PostgreSQL N+1 Loops via Static Analysis
articles.description: Eliminate API performance bottlenecks at the commit level. A case study on detecting and fixing architectural N+1 patterns programmatically.

articles.title: Exploit Analysis: search_path Hijacking (The Hidden PostgreSQL Attack)
articles.description: Engineering against architectural vulnerabilities. A professional analysis of search_path hijacking and the static analysis standard for prevention.

articles.title: Securing Middleware: The Express.js Static Analysis Standard
articles.description: The professional standard for Express.js platform security. Automate protection for Node.js services through static middleware auditing.

articles.title: Architectural Security: The NestJS Static Analysis Standard
articles.description: The engineering standard for modern NestJS applications. Detect injection points and architectural flaws automatically using static analysis.

articles.title: Serverless Security: The AWS Lambda Static Analysis Standard
articles.description: Engineering safety into the serverless stack. Automated static analysis for AWS Lambda to prevent event injection and IAM misconfigurations.

articles.title: Frontend Protection: The Browser Static Analysis Standard
articles.description: Protect the frontend host. Use automated static analysis to detect localStorage leaks and XSS sinks in professional JS architectures.

articles.title: Zero-Trust Auth: The JWT Static Analysis Standard
articles.description: Automated enforcement for bulletproof authentication. Use static analysis to detect algorithm confusion and weak secrets programmatically.

articles.title: Runtime Security at Scale: The Node.js Static Analysis Standard
articles.description: The automated standard for Node.js core security. 31 engineering rules to detect weak crypto and system leaks in CI/CD via static analysis.

articles.title: Engineering the 100x Speedup: A Static Analysis Performance Report
articles.description: A data-driven report on optimizing static analysis at scale. How we engineered a 100x speedup in the industry's most used linter plugin.

articles.title: Performance at Scale: The Static Analysis Standard for 100x Faster Linting
articles.description: Engineering for developer velocity. Use static analysis optimization to reduce CI/CD times by up to 100x while maintaining code quality.

articles.title: Hardening AI Agents: The Vercel AI Static Analysis Standard
articles.description: The first static analysis standard for AI-native applications. Automate protection against prompt injection and unvalidated agent inputs.

articles.title: Post-Mortem: Race Conditions in PostgreSQL Pools (And the Guard)
articles.description: A technical post-mortem on transaction corruption in Node.js. Learn the static analysis standard for safe transaction management on pooled clients.

articles.title: Post-Mortem: The Connection Leak Outage (And the Static Analysis Standard)
articles.description: A technical breakdown of a production outage caused by node-postgres leaks. Learn the static analysis standard we built to prevent it forever.

articles.title: Automated Compliance: The Secure Coding Static Analysis Standard
articles.description: The core engineering standard for secure software development. Map your entire fleet to OWASP Top 10 with 89 engineering-led static analysis rules.

articles.title: Hardening the Data Layer: The node-postgres Static Analysis Standard
articles.description: Eliminate the #1 database vulnerability. An automated static analysis protocol for preventing SQL injection and connection leaks in production.

articles.title: The OWASP Compliance Protocol: Mapping 247 Static Analysis Rules
articles.description: A comprehensive engineering standard for OWASP Top 10 compliance. Map your entire Node.js fleet to security standards using automated static analysis.

articles.title: The 30-Minute Security Audit: A Static Analysis Protocol for Onboarding
articles.description: A data-driven protocol for assessing a new codebase in under 30 minutes. Use automated static analysis to generate immediate risk heatmaps for CTOs and VPs.

articles.title: The Security Engineering Blueprint: A JavaScript Master Document
articles.description: The definitive engineering blueprint for high-stakes JavaScript security. 15 core architectural concepts required for senior security engineering roles.

articles.title: Exploit Analysis: The JWT Algorithm 'none' Attack (And the Guard)
articles.description: A technical analysis of the most dangerous auth misconfiguration. How to engineering static analysis guards to eliminate 'none' exploits.

articles.title: Vulnerability Case Study: Prompt Injection in Vercel AI Agents
articles.description: A strategic analysis of prompt injection in modern AI applications. How we built the static analysis standard to fix it with one line of code.

articles.title: Hardening the Data Layer: The node-postgres Engineering Standard
articles.description: Eliminate the #1 database vulnerability. An automated static analysis protocol for preventing SQL injection in high-scale Node.js environments.

articles.title: The Secret Management Standard: Automating AI Agent Protection
articles.description: Hardcoded credentials are a governance failure. Learn the static analysis standard for detecting and auto-fixing secrets in AI-native codebases.

articles.title: Post-Mortem: Why ESLint Performance Failed (And the 100x Fix)
articles.description: A technical analysis of performance degradation in large-scale static analysis. The engineering journey from 45s to 0.4s linting times.

articles.title: Benchmark Report: Why Most Security Linters Miss 80% of Vulnerabilities
articles.description: A head-to-head performance and detection benchmark. Measurable proof of how deep static analysis identifies vulnerabilities that incumbent tools miss.

articles.title: The AI Security Protocol: Hardening Vercel AI SDK Agents
articles.description: The definitive engineering standard for AI-native security. Use automated static analysis to protect agents from LLM-specific vulnerabilities.

articles.description: A complete mapping of OWASP LLM Top 10 to static analysis rules. The engineering standard for governance in the Vercel AI ecosystem.

articles.title: Your Vercel AI SDK App Has a Prompt Injection Vulnerability
articles.description: Automate the detection and prevention of prompt injection in AI-native SDKs. A measurable protocol for sustaining AI security at scale.
